document.full_text: goldman sachs  and others said they did not urge the tokyo stock exchange to halt trading because of japan's earthquake and subsequent nuclear crisis, despite a comment from the bourse's chief that some foreign banks had pressed for a halt.
document.title: goldman, others: didn't seek tokyo exchange halt
lines_and_colors: goldman sachs  and others said they did not urge the tokyo stock exchange to halt trading because of japan's earthquake and subsequent nuclear crisis, despite a comment from the bourse's chief that some foreign banks had pressed for a halt.
